news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Kenyan-based startup InspiraFarms has raised $1.09 million for off-grid energy cold storage projects in Africa, aiming to reduce food waste and support rural communities.

identifier.value: Apple Mobile Web App Status Bar Style

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: InspiraFarms™, Mosa Meat, Agricool, Agriprotein, and Rockstart are involved in the agri-food technology sector. Mosa Meat and Agricool focus on sustainable and innovative food production methods, while Agriprotein specializes in nutrient recycling for animal feed. Rockstart empowers purpose-driven founders across Energy, AgriFood, and EmergingTech, aligning with the sustainable and innovative focus of the other companies.

org_similarity_list.source_short_description: Agricool grows local, tasty and pesticide-free fruits and vegetables by recycling shipping containers into urban farms.

overview_description.description: InspiraFarms supplies turnkey, modular, and affordable agricultural processing and value addition platform to the small scale fruit, vegetable, and dairy industries that meet global food safety certification and quality standards for the supply of healthy and nutritious food to local and international markets.

properties.growth_insight_description: InspiraFarms may be growing as it has recently secured funding of one point zero nine million dollars for off-grid energy cold storage projects in Africa. This financial injection indicates an expansion of operations and an increase in the company's ability to undertake new projects. The funding is specifically aimed at enhancing the company's presence in the agriculture and food processing industries by improving cold storage capabilities, which is crucial for food safety and extending the shelf life of perishable goods. The investment also suggests confidence from investors in InspiraFarms' business model and growth potential within the food and beverage sector.

about_short_description.short_description: InspiraFarms™ supplies modular, FOOD-SAFE certification ready modular processing and cold storage technology.

product.name: Cold Rooms
product.description: Pre-fabricated and modular facilities designed to maintain perishable products at a predetermined low or medium temperature.

product.name: Pre-cooling
product.description: Forced-air solutions that optimize cooling performance by reducing cooling times and removing field heat faster than conventional methods.

product.name: Packhouses
product.description: Modular facilities tailored for perishable products, integrating areas for reception, processing, and packing with efficient cooling and workflows.

product.name: Long-term storage
product.description: Facilities designed for bulky crops and long-storage needs, providing controlled atmosphere solutions for products like root vegetables and fruits.

product.name: Freezing Rooms
product.description: Modular freezers managing temperatures down to -30°C, designed to preserve perishable products for long periods.

product.name: Slaughterhouses
product.description: Modular facilities tailored for different types of animal protein, ensuring quality and safety through specific cold chain protocols.
